column1: upon  the  request  of the  wife  of the  petitioner  he  appeared  yet  the  petitioner  was
absconding.  The  AAL  again  declined  to  appear  and  the  indictment  was  handed
back to  court.  On the same date on 27.10.2003, AAL Karunaratne Herath by  letter
intimated to court that he  has been retained by the petitioner and that,  as the  AAL
is unwell the matter to be refixed. However there after there was no  appearance for
the petitioner nor did the petitioner appear in High Court since then.
